programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 2
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Keanu Reeves. Super-assassin John Wick is brought out of retirement once again when an old debt is called in by an Italian crime lord. programme.title: Book Club: The Next Chapter
programme.desc: Four best friends take their book club to Italy for the fun girls' trip they never had. When things go off the rails and secrets are revealed, their relaxing vacation turns into a once-in-a-lifetime cross-country adventure. programme.title: Breaking News in Yuba County
programme.desc: When her husband goes missing, underappreciated suburban home-maker Sue Buttons gets a taste of being a local celebrity as she embarks on a city-wide search of Yuba County to find him. programme.title: The Glorias
programme.desc: The story of feminist icon Gloria Steinem's itinerant childhood and its influence on her life as a writer, activist and organiser for women's rights worldwide. programme.title: The Guilt Trip
programme.desc: An inventor driving across America to demonstrate his new cleaning product stops off at his mother's house along the way. programme.desc: Action comedy starring Seth Rogen, Cameron Diaz and Jay Chou. When party-loving Britt Reid's father dies and he inherits the family media business, his life changes dramatically. programme.title: Jumanji
programme.sub-title: Action, Family, Fantasy, Drama, Comedy, Children's ║ 1995 ║ PG
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure starring Robin Williams. In 1969, a young boy called Alan gets trapped in the strange jungle world of a magical board game he has unearthed on a building site. programme.title: Death Becomes Her
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Fantasy, Drama, Horror, Sci Fi ║ 1992 ║ PG
programme.desc: Black comedy starring Meryl Streep, Bruce Willis and Goldie Hawn. In the 14 years since actress Madeline Ashton stole writer Helen Sharp's fiancé, time has not been kind. programme.title: King Ralph
programme.desc: Comedy starring John Goodman, Peter O'Toole and John Hurt. When the cream of the British monarchy is tragically wiped out, the dregs of the royal line produce an unexpected new heir to the throne: Las Vegas lounge singer Ralph Jones. programme.desc: Drama based on a true story starring Matthew McConaughey, Jennifer Garner and Jared Leto. programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: Young, uptight and unsuccessful English writer Henry's latest novel sells poorly. But when the book suddenly becomes a surprise hit in Mexico, his publicist insists he travel there on a promotional tour. Upon arrival, a confused Henry discovers the reason behind the popularity - Mexican translator Maria has rewritten the dull book as a steamy erotic story. A furious Henry and reluctant Maria must now travel together on a book tour across Mexico. As tempers flair and sparks fly, the two begin to find love. Romantic comedy, starring Sam Claflin and Veronica Echegui Robert Shaye - Director Robert Shaye - Director Robert Shaye - Director Robert Shaye - Director.

programme.title: Everybody Wants Some!!
programme.desc: Eternally cool director Richard Linklater's "spiritual sequel" to 1993's slacker hit Dazed and Confused follows a house full of baseball jocks as they spend some quality party time together before the start of the 1980 college year. Over four wonderfully wasted days, freshman Jake (Blake Jenner) bonds with his new teammates over bongs, babes, beer and batting practice... all to some of the finest tracks ever to grace a cassette player. programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: In October 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir initially refuses to act on intelligence that suggests Egypt and Syria intend to launch a co-ordinated military offensive against Israel. Eventually the attacks begin, catching Minister of Defence Moshe Dayan off guard. Meir refuses to accept his resignation and a weakened Dayan leads the Israeli response, which requires Meir to request air support from US Secretary of State, Henry Kissinger. Biopic, starring Helen Mirren, Zed Josef and Liev Schreiber Guy Nattiv - Director Helen Mirren - Golda Meir Liev Schreiber - Henry Kissinger Camille Cottin - Lou Kaddar Rami Heuberger - Moshe Dyan Lior Ashkenazi - David \Dado\ Elazar.

programme.title: The Canterville Ghost
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Animation, Comedy ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: According to legend, Sir Simon de Canterville drowned his wife Lady Eleanor in the lake of Canterville Chase and for hundreds of years the nobleman's ghost has been cursed to haunt the manor. American patriarch Hiram B Otis moves from Boston into the country pile with his clan. Daughter Virginia makes her displeasure about the move clear and she forges a pact with Sir Simon to scare her parents back to America. programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: During the summer of 1957, ex-racecar driver Enzo Ferrari is in crisis. Bankruptcy stalks the company he and his wife, Laura, built from nothing a decade earlier. Attempting to secure their survival, he rolls the dice on one race - 1,000 miles across Italy, the iconic Mille Miglia. programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: In October 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir initially refuses to act on intelligence that suggests Egypt and Syria intend to launch a co-ordinated military offensive against Israel. Eventually the attacks begin, catching Minister of Defence Moshe Dayan off guard. Meir refuses to accept his resignation and a weakened Dayan leads the Israeli response, which requires Meir to request air support from US Secretary of State, Henry Kissinger. Biopic, starring Helen Mirren, Zed Josef and Liev Schreiber Guy Nattiv - Director Helen Mirren - Golda Meir Liev Schreiber - Henry Kissinger Camille Cottin - Lou Kaddar Rami Heuberger - Moshe Dyan Lior Ashkenazi - David \Dado\ Elazar.

programme.title: The Canterville Ghost
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Animation, Comedy ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: According to legend, Sir Simon de Canterville drowned his wife Lady Eleanor in the lake of Canterville Chase and for hundreds of years the nobleman's ghost has been cursed to haunt the manor. programme.desc: Alan returns to London as he walks from one iconic market to another, ambling from Smithfields to Spitalfields where he meets fellow actor Larry Lamb. (5/8).
